DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of a booster dose of GSK Biologicals' reduced antigen content diphtheria, tetanus, acellular pertussis (dTpa) vaccine - Boostrix in comparison with Chinese DT vaccine, in children 6-8 years of age.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess Safety & Immunogenicity of GSK Biologicals' Boostrix (dTpa) Vaccine vs. Chinese DT Vaccine
DOC.criteria: A male or female between, and including, 68 years of age at the time of vaccination, Written informed consent obtained from the parent or guardian of the subject, Subjects who have received a total of 4 doses of DTP vaccine in the first 2 years of life, subjects who have received previous DTP booster vaccination since administration of the fourth dose of vaccine in second year of life can not participate. Subjects with history of diphtheria, pertussis or tetanus diseases can not participate.
